name: Counter Terrorist Shoot War 18
description:
Counter Terrorist Shoot War 18 is a full action packed shooting game. Encounter the Terrorists with multiple choice of advanced weapons like pistol, AK-47, M-4, shotgun and sniper rifle. In terrorist Shooting War game your role is as a brave commando from the army force.
Features:
- Short & long range firing rifles
- Exciting Map with Realistic War Environment
- Different Latest weapons
- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Best Shooting Game
- Afraid or in terror of terrorist, exit this game.
